game.name: Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® 3 (2011) Collection 4: Final Assault
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Saluting Modern Warfare® 3's Season of Content, the fourth and final DLC collection deploys with five all-new Multiplayer Maps.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Saluting Modern Warfare® 3's Season of Content, the fourth and final DLC collection deploys with five all-new Multiplayer Maps.
game.developers: Infinity Ward, Sledgehammer Games, Raven Software, Aspyr (Mac)
